name: Prison Of Stealth
description:
This is full of bugs but please enjoy all the same. Feel free to list any bugs found in the comments.

 

            the year is 2234 and the Americas are split into 2 parties, the Tradon Party, and the Ruulion, for the past 127 years these 2 parties have warred for control of Mega-America, it has been a bloody struggle that has cost north and south America millions of lives.

            However, things are now looking up for the Ruulion, in the last month we have captured the leader of the Tradon Party, we are now holding him in our Dungeon Prison System, but we must be on our guard, for the Tradon Party is seeking to break him out.

            You have been given our newest Defense-Towers, these towers will be able to go invisible for short periods of time giving you an edge in the upcoming battles, good luck Master-Warden.
